description: The image shows a grocery store shelf with various items. The shelf is filled with bottles, snacks, and gloves. The gloves are placed on the left side of the shelf, while the bottles are scattered throughout the shelf.

objects.name: bottles
objects.relationship: bottles are placed on the shelf, some are close to the gloves, and others are near the snacks.

objects.name: snacks
objects.relationship: snacks are placed on the shelf, some are close to the gloves, and others are near the bottles.

objects.name: gloves
objects.location: on the left side of the shelf
objects.relationship: gloves are placed on the left side of the shelf, away from the bottles and snacks.
